text: Bhojpuri language is an Indo-Aryan language which is spoken in northern- eastern India and It is mainly spoken in the Indian states of Bihar, and Uttar Pradesh. There are also Bhojpuri speakers in the Caribbean. The language today is written in Devanagari, but before was written in Kaithi. ==References== Category:Languages of India Category:Indo-Aryan languages
title: Bhojpuri language
